elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Decide whether the minors are allowed to do what they would like to do. Write down at least one pro and one contra argument for each case.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Case 1: 16-year-old Petar, a trainee car mechanic, wants to buy a second-hand moped for CHF 300. His parents do not agree. Petar has savings of CHF 2000.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Decide whether the minors are allowed to do what they would like to do. Write down at least one pro and one contra argument for each case.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Case 2: 14-year-old Linda wants to marry her 15-year-old boyfriend Martin.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Decide whether the minors are allowed to do what they would like to do. Write down at least one pro and one contra argument for each case.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Case 3: 10-year-old Lauri wants to buy a remote-controlled drone for CHF 99. His parents do not agree. However, Lauri has savings of CHF 500.

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Decide whether the minors are allowed to do what they would like to do. Write down at least one pro and one contra argument for each case.

elements.name: Frage 4
elements.title: Case 4: 16-year-old Petra, a trainee car mechatronics technician, wants to buy a second-hand car for CHF 9000 and convert it. Her parents do not agree. Petra has savings of CHF 2000.
